page.title: 18Pets in Walmer
page.content:
Most people in Walmer have pets. The most common pet is a dog. The pensioners do not have pets mainly because they can not get out to buy the food. The{pet food shop}is liked by many people but it is not used a great deal. Most people think they should sell pets as nearly everyone in Walmer likes pets.
Deal has two{pet shops}in the High Street. I asked the owners lots of questions about the shop, the animals and how they got their jobs. The owners told me that they liked their jobs because they love animals. The most popular pets are{rabbits}in summer and{hamsters}in winter.
A survey of the school showed that{75% of the school have pets. The most popular animals are{cats and dogs.
